title: Whaleer Documentation
intro: Create a strategy, test it on historical data, run the bot, and share with the community.

sections.title: 1. Strategy Creation
sections.content: Use the editor to build your strategy. Supports indicators like RSI, EMA, and volume.

sub.title: Basic Rules
sub.content: Define entry/exit conditions, e.g., buy when RSI < 30, sell when RSI > 70.

sub.title: Using Indicators
sub.content: Add RSI, EMA, MACD with customizable parameters.

sections.title: 2. Backtesting
sections.content: Test your strategy on historical data. Review performance, drawdown, and success rate.

sections.title: 3. Running a Bot
sections.content: Execute automated buy/sell with real-time data. Consider risk and fees.

sections.title: 4. Strategy Sharing
sections.content: You can mint strategies as NFTs, archive them, and share.
